meanings.definition: The quality or state of being misguided.
meanings.sent1: Her misguidednesses led her to make poor decisions.
meanings.sent2: The misguidednesses of his actions became evident over time.
meanings.sent3: Despite his misguidednesses, he always tried his best.
meanings.sent4: The misguidednesses of the situation were like a fog obscuring the truth.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's lecture on misguidednesses left a lasting impression on the students.

meanings.definition: The act or instance of being misguided.
meanings.sent1: The misguidednesses of their journey became apparent when they got lost.
meanings.sent2: After the misguidednesses, they realized they had taken the wrong path.
meanings.sent3: The comedy of errors was filled with hilarious misguidednesses.
meanings.sent4: The misguidednesses of the plan were like a tangled web of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed the misguidednesses of the characters with great clarity.
